mapper.select: select count(*) from p_cc where batch_no=#{batchNo} and line_no=#{lineNo} and create_date=#{createDate}

SELECT pc1.batch_no,pc1.line_no,pc1.pc_status,pc1.crimp_contraction,pc1.crimp_stability,DATE_FORMAT(pc1.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') create_date FROM (SELECT batch_no,line_no,pc_status,crimp_contraction,crimp_stability,create_date FROM p_cc WHERE pc_status=0 AND DATE(create_date)=#{createDate}) pc1, (SELECT batch_no,line_no FROM p_cc WHERE pc_status=1 AND DATE(create_date)=#{createDate}) pc2 WHERE pc1.batch_no=pc2.batch_no AND pc1.line_no=pc2.line_no UNION SELECT batch_no,line_no,pc_status,crimp_contraction,crimp_stability,create_date FROM p_cc WHERE pc_status=1 AND DATE(create_date)=#{createDate} ORDER BY batch_no,line_no,pc_status;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM p_cc WHERE batch_no=#{batchNo} AND line_no=#{lineNo} AND create_date=#{createDate}
mapper.update: UPDATE p_cc SET pc_status=0 WHERE batch_no=#{batchNo} AND line_no=#{lineNo} AND create_date=#{createDate}
